nlacp: A patient wants to renew the patient's expired prescriptions (i.e., prescriptions' end dates are earlier than the current date) and therefore wants to find the LHCPs who earlier wrote the patient's expired prescriptions (it is assumed that the doctors who wrote prescriptions are all LHCPs so no LHCP checks on the prescription-writing doctors are needed).

truth.subject: patient
truth.condition: lhcp wrote the patients expired prescription

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: lhcp wrote the patients expired prescription

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: lhcp wrote the patients expired prescription

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: patient has had an office visit with the lhcp

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: lhcp wrote the patients expired prescription

pred.subject: patient
pred.condition: patient wants to renew the expired prescription
